verses.1: Praise the LORD! Praise God in his heavenly dwelling; praise him in his mighty heaven!
verses.2: Praise him for his mighty works; praise his unequaled greatness!
verses.3: Praise him with a blast of the trumpet; praise him with the lyre and harp!
verses.4: Praise him with the tambourine and dancing; praise him with stringed instruments and flutes!
verses.5: Praise him with a clash of cymbals; praise him with loud clanging cymbals.
verses.6: Let everything that lives sing praises to the LORD! Praise the LORD!
